headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Los Santos Summer Special
content:
The city that has it all gets an extra dose of summer fun in the latest update to GTA Online, bringing with it a host of new activities for magnates, gearheads, and everyone in between.

- 6 new co-op missions in A Superyacht Life
- 9 new Open Wheel Race Tracks and The Open Wheel Race Creator
- 15 New Vehicles
- The Diamond Adversary Series
- New Business Battles
- 2 New Arcade Cabinets and more

Look out for weekly Summer Special Events with major bonuses and discounts in the weeks to come.
